text: What is a major difference between a gas and a liquid?

answers.text: A liquid is far less compressible than a gas
A gas is far less compressible than a liquid
A liquid is more combustible than a gas
A gas is more combustible than a liquid

text: What is the lifting force of a liquid called?

answers.text: One liquid will float on the other
They will become an intrained solution

text: Which unit of measurement would indicate velocity of flow?

answers.text: Gravity, atmospheric pressure, and applied forces

text: What determines the intensity of the excess pressure in a water-hammer wave?

answers.text: The specific gravity of the fuel
The change in gallons per minute

How do the charges of protons and electrons differ?

answers.text: Protons have positive charges, and electrons have negative charges
Protons have positive charges, and electrons have neutral charges
Protons have neutral charges, and electrons have positive charges
Protons have negative charges, and electrons have positive charges

text: The uniform movement of electrons in a specific direction is called...
Which shell of the valence electrons determines whether a material is a good or a poor conductor of electricity?
Which statement best describes a positive ion?

answers.text: An atom that lost an electron and has more protons
An atom that lost a proton and has more electrons
An atom that has an equal number of electrons and protons
An atom that cannot throw off any protons

answers.text: Magnetic lines of force never cross each other
When a permanent magnet and a temporary magnet are put together
When the south pole of a magnet is placed near the north pole of another magnet
When the north pole of a magnet is placed near the north pole of another magnet

text: What are the two most common methods of producing voltage?

text: What type of material is used to construct the fuel tank on the R-11?

answers.text: The electric control module cuts power to the bottom loading electric air solenoid
The bottom loading valve modulates to prevent deadheading
The electronic control module cuts power to the fillstand pump
The bottom loading valve cuts power to the electronic control module

text: When should Bourdon gauges be calibrated?
What may a filter separator differential pressure reading below 3 psi indicate?

answers.text: A defective O-ring or ruptured coalescers

text: When performing meter calibrations, what is the accetable difference between the master meter and the meter being calibrated?

answers.text: 1/2 gallon for each 100 gallons passing through the meter
1/2 gallon for each 500 gallons passing through the meter
1 gallon for each 100 gallons passing through the meter
1 gallong for each 500 gallons passing through the meter

text: Initial tool listings for individual tool kits (ITK) and composite tool kits (CTK) include all of the following except...

answers.text: Ensure proper use, care and security of bench stock items
Establish the master bench detail record
Install, maintain, and update on-base bench stock placards

text: Which of the following is not a reason for adding items to bench stock

answers.text: The item is not included in the AFMC initial spares support list for the equipment being supported
The unit of issue is not compatible with the unit of use
The FMFC feels the flight can't wait for items to be delivered from the warehouse
A geographically separated location uses the item and the item must be at the using location

text: When may deletions from the bench stock listing be processed?

answers.text: When requested by the flight, or when the bench stock review listing shows no consumption in the past 270 days
When requested by the flight only
At the discretion of LRS customer service element only
At the discretion of the LRS customer service element, or when the bench stock review listing shows no consumption in the past 270 days

answers.text: Hoses used for hot refueling E-4B aircraft

text: How often should a filter separator vessel be cleaned?

answers.text: Every three years, or when coalescer elements are changed
Every year, or when high concentrations of water detected
Every two years, or when sediment levels exeed tolerances
Every five years, or when fiber sample fails

All items followed by an ampersand (&)

text: When preparing to perform an annual inspection, review all of the following forms for annotated discepencies except...

answers.text: A decrease in the annular space micron reading

text: What action, if any, should be taken if a commercial delivery operator does not provide a Department of Defense (DD) Form 250 with a liquid oxygen (LOX) shipment?

answers.text: Inform the FSC and await further guidance

text: When documenting a cryogenic product issue to a LOX cart on the AFTO Form 134, how should odor test results be annotated in block 2?

As either "PASS" or "FAIL" in column B
As either "GO" or "NO GO" in column C

answers.text: After a LOX cart has been filled
